modName: Realistic body CBBE - HDT TBBP preset
summary: Realistic body based on real photos, breast size B to DD. No giant breast or ridiculous over sized hips to be found here. It's saved to a multitude of armor, body and clothing mods.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://dai.ly/x29mqxn]Video[/url]    <--- [font=Comic Sans MS]Video[/font]
[url=http://i.imgur.com/JqAt4DG.gif]~_^[/url]
1/1/2015
Added a optional file, Jer's body. It's the same as the main file but with a smaller butt and belly. Don't use TBBP belly xml files with this
option, it won't look right. Different HDT xml files will change the looks of your body, I use and recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59416/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D59416&pUp=1]This[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zCEgLdV.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Gd5G7En.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/mwUlzUF.jpg[/img]



Update 11/15/2014
I added SKYRIM Enhanced High polygons and bodyslide support  to my preset.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59960/?
Here's all the mods my preset is saved to
http://i.imgur.com/jPXBWtu.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/Lkx1HVO.jpg




Update 9/30/14

I've decided to upload my current bodyslide preset, it's based off of the B to D body preset. (Jer's B to DD)
You'll need HDT V14.28, Bodyslide 2 and XP32 maximum Skeleton Extended v2.06(Groovtama). I use the CBBE HDT body to build this on, but you can use which ever you prefer. ( And I'm using Pclp2014 HDT xml file, search for  HDT Breast Physic and Collision for Sevenbase, UNP/UNPB, CBBE and Topmodel 1.1a    on google)  The preset is also saved to a number of armor mods, and bodys.


[font=Times New Roman][b]BodySlide 2.0+,  HDT v14.28[/b][/font](unless you're using a non HDT body),  [b][font=Times New Roman]XPMSE 2.+(No BBP version for HDT, I use the one off site on LL)[/font][/b] [b][font=Times New Roman]and this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59416/?]XML[/url].[/font][/b]


If you don't have the mods I listed above, your body will not look like my screenshots.

It's a bodyslide preset, not much else to say.

Put in your sliderpresets folder.
author: Userguy24
